author: Special Correspondent
text:
C. Paul Princely Rajkumar, Revenue Divisional Officer and Returning Officer for Sankagiri Assembly constituency, inspected the infrastructure facilities available in the polling stations in various villages.

Mr. Rajkumar visited the polling stations in Makudanchavadi, Kannantheri, A. Pudur and Thappakuttai villages recently and inspected the toilet, drinking facilities, availability of power supply, ramp facility for differently abled and security arrangements.

Discussion

Later, he held discussion with the revenue officials concerned with poll works.

Mr. Rajkumar also convened a meeting of the poll officials to discuss about the infrastructure facilities in the polling stations in Sankagiri block and security arrangements.

The RDO directed the officials to take steps for enrolling the names of all the eligible voters in the villages and also to prepare a list of the differently abled persons.

Sundaram, Returning Officer of Yercaud Assembly constituency, too inspected the infrastructure facilities in the polling stations in Mundakampadi Panchayat school, Government High School, Nasareth School, St. Joseph Primary School in Yercaud taluk.
title: Returning Officers inspect polling stations
